targets.expr: irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[$__rate_interval]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[$__rate_interval])

title: Spring Boot Statistics
description: Dashboard for Spring Boot2 Statistics(by micrometer-prometheus).
